name: Cajun Shrimp Pasta with Alfredo Sauce
author: hand
summary: Very good, easy to prepare shrimp pasta with just enough Cajun to give it a little zip.
ingredients: 1 pound raw shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: Bring a pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Saute garlic until fragrant, about 1 minute
Add Cajun seasoning, salt, and pepper
Add shrimp and cook for 1 to 1 1/2 minutes
Turn shrimp over and cook, about 1 to 1 1/2 minute more
Transfer to a bowl and cover with aluminum foil to keep warm, leaving the butter in the skillet
Place pasta in the boiling water; cook until tender yet firm to the bite, 8 to 10 minutes
Add flour to the butter in the skillet; cook for 30 seconds
Add milk, cream, lemon juice, and soy sauce
Cook and stir until flavors blend, about 5 minutes
Add the shrimp and cook until well coated and opaque, about 5 minutes more
Spoon the shrimp and sauce on top of the cooked pasta
